post_title: FS Red Kleinow w/bat Grey Sky Variation
post_content:
For sale Red Kleinow  NY w/bat Grey Sky color variation PSA 4.
This card has a grey sky background. I have not seen another one like this as it usually has a light blue  background. The PSA 3 card shown is the usual color of this card and is only shown for comparison and not included in the sale price.
Asking $350.00 plus $5.00 shipping PP F&F .

Thanks for looking .
John P
